title: Percentage of a Number
description: Calculate what a certain percentage of a number is. Useful for discounts, tips, taxes, and other percentage-based calculations.
howTo: Enter the number you want to calculate a percentage of
The result shows what the percentage of the number is
You can use this for discounts, tips, taxes, and more

faq.question: How do I calculate a percentage of a number?
faq.answer: To calculate a percentage of a number, multiply the number by the percentage and divide by 100. For example, 20% of 100 = (100 Ã— 20) / 100 = 20.

faq.question: Can I use this for discounts?
faq.answer: Yes! Enter the original price as the number and the discount percentage. The result will show the discount amount.

faq.question: What if I want to calculate a tip?
faq.answer: Enter the bill amount as the number and the tip percentage (e.g., 15 for 15% tip). The result will show the tip amount.
